reviews.comments: Es un lugar excelente, super recomiendo !!!
El departamento es más lindo que en las fotos, es realmente hermoso! Muy bien decorado y equipado con todo lo que necesitas para que tu estadía sea ideal! Lo recomiendo 100%.

Muy cómodo el departamento, tal cual se lo ve en las fotos, muy buena ubicación, a una cuadra de la av Santa Fe, muy accesible al transporte público, también encontrar buenos restaurantes y bares caminando por la zona! Altamente recomendable !!
Excelente ubicación.  El dpto superó mis expectativas. Se adecuo  a todas mis necesidades. Altamente recomendable.
Muy buena estadía. Clara es muy gentil y se nota que es buena persona.. volvería a hospedarme en su departamento.

Muy lindo departamento, con una excelente ubicación.
Cerca de zona de bares, estación de subte y avenidas.
Muy recomendable!
Un departamento con todas las comodidades, pulcro y de diseño.  Muy recomendable, al igual que su anfitriona.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias, esperamos verte pronto nuevamente.

reviews.comments:
La estadía la disfrutamos muchísimo, el aviso y las fotos reflejan la realidad de un hermoso departamento muy bien ubicado.
La atención, celeridad en la respuesta y puntualidad de Clara (nuestra anfitriona), merecen un punto extra en la calificación
Gracias por todo!!!
Muy buena ubicación, El departamento es tal cual lo muestran en las fotos y Clara excelente anfitriona! Muchas gracias tuvimos una muy linda estadía.

El dúplex de Palermo es espectacular!!! 
Tuve la oportunidad de estar unos días por trabajo en Buenos Aires y la verdad que disfrute ampliamente mi estadía en el departamento de Clara. 
La zona es muy tranquila y el departamento es super luminoso, está ubicado contra frente con una linda vista a una palmera y tiene un balcón muy cómodo para tomar algo o fumar tranquilo.
A dos cuadras hay subte, a una cuadra hay colectivos y taxis, y a cinco o seis cuadras están los bosques de Palermo con una laguna para salir a pasear o correr. 
De noche se puede ir caminando a los bares de Palermo Hollywood o a Las Cañitas, que también están muy cerca a pie.
Recomiendo el departamento, yo definitivamente voy a volver en los próximos meses.
Muchas gracias Clara,
Francisco
reviews.response: Gracias Francisco !!! Me alegro que la hayas pasado bien en el departamento. Esperamos que la próxima vez puedas venir de vacaciones o con mas tiempo para conocer mejor la ciudad, los restaurantes y espectaculos. Te esperamos cuando gustes. Saludos, Clara

reviews.comments: Muy buena ubicación y todo tal como aparece en las fotos. Recomendadísimo.

La pasamos muy bien , la ubicación es muy buena , la estación de subte de ministro Carranza a un par de cuadras , una panadería a menos de una cdra y un shopping a menos de 3 , además de cercanía a recoleta y a la estación del bus de turismo , nos encantó ! El wifi muy bien ! Es cómodo y ameno , nos hubiera encantado hacer uso del balcón , será para la próxima . Clara , siempre estuvo presta a ayudar y resolver consultas , recomendable !
El loft está en un excelente lugar. Es céntrico y queda cerca de muchos restaurantes y bares.

Super recomendable! Clara una excelente anfitriona, muy atenta.
El duplex muy lindo, amplio. limpio y comodo. Una ubicacion muy buena en uno de los mejores barrios de Buenos Aires.
Excelente departamento, muy bien ubicado, cuenta con todo lo necesario.

El departamento está ubicado en un lugar cercano a reconocidos restaurantes, tiendas, supermercados y transporte público. Es cómodo y exacto para nuestras necesidades. Un detalle que es importante para mí: la ducha es potente y el jabón de miel que Clara nos proporcionó es excelente. Tan bueno, que me compré un par para traer a casa. Muchas gracias, tuvimos una agradable estadía en una ciudad maravillosa.

Muy lindo departamento, ubicado en Palermo con fácil acceso a restaurantes, transporte público y cualquier punto de la ciudad.
Clara es muy amable y pudo acomodar sin inconveniente mi horario de check in.

Todo super bien, el piso esta en al barrio de Palermo donde hay muchos restaurantes y tiendas y tal, es muy bonito y luminoso como las fotos y tranquillo tambien, dormi muy bien alli :)
Si vuelvo a Buenos Aires, seguro que me quedare otra vez en el loft de Clara!

Muy muy contentos de haber encontrado este precioso dúplex de Clara!
Mejor ubicación imposible! A una cuadra de Av. Santa Fe y sus colectivos y a 3 cuadras del subte. Lleno de restaurantes, cafés y tiendas a su alrededor, con toda la buena onda de Palermo. Muy cómodo, espacioso y con todo lo necesario para hacer de la estadía una buenísima experiencia :). Y muchas gracias a Clara por recibirnos tan bien! Se preocupó desde antes de que llegáramos y respondió rapidísimo a todos los mensajes y preguntas, además de aconsejarnos los mejores lugares de la zona.
Volveremos de todas maneras!

El apartamenteo es tal cual aparece en las fotos, es limpio y decorado muybien, la anfitriona muy amable y pendiente de mi llegada, me ayudo con lo que necesitaba y me brindo gran comodidad y un  excelente  presente a mi llegada! estuve muy a gusto. El barrio es residencial,  tiene adecuado acceso  para comprar en supermercado y para colectivo y subte. Fue seguro y sin problema
reviews.response: Muchas gracias Yuly! esperamos verte pronto :)

reviews.comments:
El departamento es hermoso por dentro tal cual como en las fotografias. Todo en buen funcionamiento y bien mantenido. 
La host te ayuda en todo lo que necesites. Ademas tienes la estacion de subte a 3 cuadras. Cerca de la casa tienes av santa fe que encuentras todo, supermercados, verdulerias, kioscos, tiendas de ropa, y tambien algunos restaurantes. Lo unico es que el edificio esta un poco viejo ¨dated¨especialmente el hall y el exterior del edificio.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias Pamela, gusto en conocerte y esperamos verte pronto nuevamente !

reviews.comments: Piso / loft bien ubicado, limpio, edificio nuevo. Todo muy bien. Recomendable para 1 o 2 personas.

Una experiencia más q positiva ! El apartamento es excelente tal como lo reflejan las fotos y clara una genial anfitriona. Más q recomendable . La ubicación es muy buena y tiene gran variedad de comercios cerca y transporte para todos los puntos .

Lindo espacio; impecable, agradable, moderno y cómodo, totalmente equipado. Provoca quedarse mucho más tiempo de lo esperado. Recomendado totalmente para quien busca un pequeño sitio lleno de paz y armonía con brisas de Buenos Aires.
Bastante bien! Muy bonito apartamento, muy bien conectado para el transporte y cuenta con todo lo necesario! Cerca hay unos restaurantes y bares muy buenos

El loft. Era hermoso... moderno ,muy practico, y bien equipado.  El barrio tranquilo muy bien ubicado, el comercio, tiendas y la parada del subte super cerca de la av. Santa fe. Clara muy linda y amable. Las instalaciones del edificio muy seguras y limpias.

Seguro volveremos buenos aires. Nos encantó.  Abrazos. : )
Excelente anfitriona, preocupada de todos los detalles, el departamento super comodo muy bien ubicado, super seguro, lindo
reviews.response: Muchas Gracias Tatiana! Me alegro mucho que hayan disfrutado su estadia! si la proxima vez viajan solos, espero que nos vuelvan a elegir!!

reviews.comments: Gracias a Clara para su hospitalidad! Nos ha ayudado mucho al llegar en Buenos Aires indicarnos que hacer y como llegar al apartamiento y también prestarnos su sube tarjeta (que hemos olvidado dejar... lo siento por eso). El apartamiento es muy limpio y agradable para pasar un momento en Buenos Aires. Lo recomendamos fuertemente!

The duplex apartment is located in a very nice part of town in walking distance from many nice restaurants and bars. The next subte station/train station is just a few blocks away. Communication with the owner was excellent and very friendly. The apartment itself was spacious, clean and well equipped.
Clean close and cozy !
Best place ever!!!! Would recommend it to anyone!!!
Everything was great. Cosy. Great location. Safe neighborhood. Thanks!

Clean, cute & cozy, the apartment is exactly as it looks like on the pictures! Perfect amount of space for two people and everything you could ever need! It included towels, bathroom items, clean sheets, dishes and very well equipped kitchen.

Clara was such a GREAT host! She was very kind, easy to reach & quick with responses from the very begging. When we arrived, she even surprised us with a bottle of Argentinean wine since we had previously told her it was our anniversary trip! 

The area is PERFECT! A lot of cool little places around, great restaurants and bars and just 2 minutes walk to the subway or bus station. Very well connected with Palermo’s main attractions: I fully recommend Bosques de Palermo for a nice walk and rest over the lake!   

We had an awesome experience staying at Clara’s place. We HIGHLY recommend her apartment! 

Thank you Clara!!
reviews.response: Thanks Soledad, you were excellent guests!! Very friendly, nice and gentle people. They left the apartment in very good conditions, everything in order, and very clean indeed. I surely recommend them as guests and I am happy they had enjoyed their stay in Buenos Aires!

reviews.comments: Clara was a wonderful host, very flexible and responsive. Thanks for a great and affordable stay.
Great place in central location. Great host
O local é ideal para duas pessoas. Localizado no bairro de Palermo, perto de restaurantes ; mercados e do que mais é necessário para ter uma estadia tranquila. Recomendo sem dúvidas o local da Clara!
I had pleasant stay at Clara’s apartment.
Awesome experience

Clara heeft een mooie, originele ruimte in een van de gezelligste en veiligste buurten in Buenos Aires waar volop winkels en restaurants zijn.  In deze hectische wereldstad ligt haar appartement aan een rustige grote binnenplaats met uitzicht op een palm. Van het verkeer hoor je vrijwel niets maar soms hoor je de buren. Het openbaar vervoer is uitstekend bereikbaar vanaf haar Airbnb; bussen en de metro rijden één straat verderop. Het huis is schoon, de keuken is redelijk geoutilleerd en je kunt makkelijk met Clara communiceren. Kortom, voor een verblijf in BA is haar appartement voor 2 personen ideaal! Ik kan het iedereen aanbevelen.

Plus: 
Lage: Wohnung in einer guten uns sicheren Umgebung mit guten Restaurants, Shoppingmöglichkeiten, guten Verbindungen Down-Town.
Wohnung: Hübsche kleine Wohnung für 2 Personen.
Minus: 
Mangelhafte Wartung. 
Küche dürftig eingerichtet
Sehr ringhörig (man kann den Nachbar sprechen hören). 
In 12 Tagen 2 mal Party all Night long bei Nachbarn.

Clara was very good at communication.  However, the place itself was a bit rough... Bathroom/shower was full of mold, broken knob, ants and gnats; my face towel was dirty at check-in, and other towels were really cheap and worn; furniture in the apartment was a bit worn and soiled; a laughable 75% of all lightbulbs were burnt out; lock on balcony was broken; walls scuffed, and walls so thin that you could hear neighbors at normal voice level.

O apartamento da Clara é exatamente como nas fotos: limpo, aconchegante, muito confortável e extremamente bem localizado. Eu e minha esposa ficamos 1 semana em BA, fizemos muitos programas a pé, partindo do apartamento. A Clara foi muito atenciosa e respondeu todas dúvidas imediatamente. Além disso, ela deixou disponível no apartamento alguns guias de BA e um documento ainda com indicações de lugares próximos ao apartamento, os quais ela indica. Deixou disponível também outras toalhas e roupas limpas de cama. Não usamos nem metade delas. O prédio possui elevador e é muito seguro. A vizinhança é muito segura e possui as melhores opções de café da manhã,  almoço e jantar nas redondezas. Certamente voltarei e ficarei no mesmo local.
We had a very good time in Clara's apartment. It's super well located, makes it easy to visit the city.
Really nice apartment in a good area. Clara was really helpful and even made a list of restaurants and bars to see. Would recommend

Clean, close to public transportation in a safe neighborhood. The apartment is well provisioned and requires little to no augment in order to make it feel like home. The bed was super comfortable too!!
The appartement was perfect, cosy and confortable.

I had a great week staying at Clara's apartment. It's a beautiful loft, furnished with everything you need, and super clean! Clara was a great host, and super easy to communicate with--when I return to BA, I'm definitely going to see if Clara's place is available!!

Clara's apartment was clean, comfortable and modern. She was also really on top of her communication with me which was much appreciated. It worked perfectly for my stay as I was in BA for work as it was 8 minutes on foot from my office. Also, the water pressure was excellent. I will be recommending to my coworkers when they come visit. Note - this place worked perfectly for me because I did not plan on doing any cooking but if you want to do that, another apartment may be better off as the kitchen had the basics but not an extensive array of knives, pots and pans, etc.

We had a wonderful stay at Clara's lovely apartment! From the beginning communication was very quick and helpful from Clara and check in was a breeze.

The location is perfect for a fun stay in BA and the apartment had everything we needed! I would highly recommend staying here - thanks Clara!
Apartamento bem localizado e possui tudo o que precisa para ter uma ótima estadia.
Such a great place to set up in BA. Close to the Subway & buses that can take you everywhere. Clara was really helpful is getting us settled and giving us some hints on the local area.

This is a clean, bright, trendy, and comfortable home away from home. It has great wifi, sunlight and fantastic water pressure! The kitchen is great for making meals at the apartment if you're interested. The apartment is very well maintained and great for a couple. The neighborhood has all the amenities you may need: grocery stores, laundry, banks, restaurants, lots of taxis and access to public transport. This part of Palermo is very residential and wasn't the most exciting part of BA to be. We would have preferred something like San Telmo. That being said, it was very quiet and was a nice escape from the hustle and bustle, if that's what you're interested in. Clara is a FANTASTIC host and was easy to get in touch with before and during our stay. She was flexible in accommodating our check in and check out needs and answered all our questions.

The apartment has a very nice feel to it. Well located. Comfy. Central but quiet. The hosts are very responsive and accommodating, I loved the neighbourhood. Two good Batista coffeeshops in walking distance (Barrio cafetero and Lab ). Would def return there

Clara's apartment was the perfect place for the two of us during our week in Buenos Aires. It's clean, bright & airy, has lots of space to relax and even unpack your bags, with everything you need to feel at home (like an outfitted kitchen, pantry basics, towels/hairdryer, amazing shower water pressure). We loved the location in Palermo Hollywood - around the corner from a great bakery, nice restaurants, and with easy access to many bus lines and the metro. It's on a leafy, quieter residential street, too, so while you're close to the hustle & bustle of the neighborhood you can get a good night of rest. 

Clara was so accommodating to us, responsive to our questions, and very helpful at check in with recommendations for nearby restaurants. She also let us check out late the day of our outbound flight, since there wasn't anyone else booked to stay that evening. We really appreciated that extra hospitality! We would happily stay at Clara's again and recommend it highly!

We spent a fantastic week in Clara's apartment. It is located in the heart of Palermo with easy access to the metro station. The apartment is quiet at night and has all the basic necessities. It was also a tremendous value.
We had a lovely stay at Clara's apartment. Nice area and close to everything. Clara is a super good host and helps with everything that's needed.

Our stay at Clara's apartment was great!! The location was a perfect base for us to explore the city. Very close to transit, super market & tons of great restaurants yet tucked away in a quiet street. The neighborhood is very safe as we had walked back pretty late after dinner many times during our stay. The apartment itself was great, exactly as described in the listing and very well equipped. Clara was very easy to communicate with. Overall our stay was memorable & i highly recommend Clara's apartment for your stay in BA.

The apartment is in good position, close to sub  station by which you can reach the most important sites of the city and palermo hollywood is the rhight place to live the night in Buenos Aires. Clara was a nice host.

Clara's modern loft in Hollywood Palermo is a great location. Easy waking distances to all the the neighborhood has to offer, grocery store, great restaurants, bars and shopping in Palermo SoHo. Checkin and out was easy and I'd recommend the listing to anyone.

Clara is a great host and communication is very fast and easy. 
The apartment is nice, clean and situated in a great neighborhood. Would definitely recommend it!
Had a great stay at Clara's. Very professional host and offered excellent recommendations for nearby restaurants and things to do. Definitely recommend!!
We stayed in Clara's apartment for 2 weeks in November. It is a great apartment - clean tidy and well stocked with everything you need to feel at home.

Clara is a wonderful Airbnb host! She was extremely welcoming and helpful—she even prepared a folder full of local recommendations that came in very handy throughout our stay. The apartment is in a perfect location. Just a short walk to everything, but tucked away enough to enjoy a quiet night's rest. We throughly enjoyed our long weekend there and we will definitely be back!
Great location, fabulous apartment with balcony. Couldn't ask for more. Fully recommend.
Very well located and very comfortable place to stay
Clara was 100%. Terrific place in a great location, great value.
Everything was great! Want to come back! Thank you Clara.
Great experience! Everything matched the pictures and Clara was helpful and very friendly!

This Airbnb property was exactly what we expected and perfect for our needs. We were 2 people staying there for about a week. First time in Buenos Aires, it was close to the subway line in order to explore all the different neighborhoods. Even though we arrived late at night, we were still able to get the keys and returning it was just as easy. Shower has great water pressure and the instructions that were left were very helpful. 

Clara was a great host and support available for any questions we had. I'd definitely stay here again!
reviews.response:
Thank you Anh!!!
hope to see you soon!! nice to meet you

reviews.comments: Great location. Palermo is the best place to stay and super convenient for getting around the rest of BA. The apartment is nice and clean, looks exactly like the photos and the shower is great!

Clara was very accommodating for our arrival and getting us started in the city. For our two-week stay in the winter, we were cozy and comfortable whether we wished to stay in or out. And we found it easy to navigate the city and get around from this location.

My mother and I had a fantastic stay at the Loft! The location was extremely close to subway which gave us the ability to go all over BA very easily. The area was also very safe and full of shops and restaurants to be enjoyed. The apartment pictures were very accurate! The place was clean, cozy and the shower pressure was amazing! Our host communicated very efficiently, gave us a lot of advice on the surroundings and even helped us book a taxi to the airport for our return. Would absolutely return and recommend it to anyone visiting BA!
reviews.response:
Thank you Stephanie, nice to meet you,  we are glad you and you mother had a good time.
Hope to See you next time !

reviews.comments: Great place, just like the pictures! Clara is really nice!
reviews.response: Thank you George, nice to meet you! See you Next time !

reviews.comments:
Clara was very helpful and responsive at all times which was great. We had the best time 
The.apartment location and description is 100% accurate and was so centrally based to everything. Very good experience all round! Thanks

The whole experience was great! It was our first time in the city and we had a great experience. Our host Clara was great and communicated with us without problems. The loft was exactly as it was shown and everything went really well. Lots of great restaurants and cafes all within walking distance from the loft. Also, the quick access to the D subway line was amazing. Saved us lots of money on cabs. I highly recommend it!

I had a great experience staying at Clara's loft. She was extremely attentive to all details, and facilitated the access to the apartment even when my arrival time was so late. 
The loft is so well located that everything was round the corner, restaurants, groceries, pharmacy, all public transportation.  
Great internet speed for work, as I had to conduct calls on IP, the service simply worked as a charm. 
Cable TV widely provided for entertainment if you do not feel to go out.  I would stay again.  Thank you Clara for your great hospitality.

Beautiful airy apartment in the heart of Palermo Hollywood. Perfect for a traveling couple as a home base in BA. Clara was very helpful in giving recommendations and answering questions before and during our stay. Highly recommended!

Clara's place in the heart of Palermo Hollywood was the perfect location for us to stay because we were able to explore BA by foot.  It's close to a lot of restaurants and bars, and the area felt safe.  Her place was very comfortable, clean and quite. 

Clara is a very good host.  She was very prompt in communicating and was flexible with our checkin and check out times.  I'd definitely stay at her place again.
This apartment is in a great location. The building is safe and secure. The apartment was clean and had good natural light. WIFI information was provided.

We had a fantastic time staying at this loft duplex in BA. Clara's sister Victoria met us at the apartment checked us in and was very helpful with any local information we needed. The loft is very spacious, has everything you need, very clean and just a perfect base to explore BA. Most of the best restaurants are walkable and I would have absolutely no hesitation recommending this place to people traveling to BA.

Clara made us feel extremely welcome and helped us coordinate our departure. The place is ideal for two and was spotless! Not much of a view but it didn't matter. The area is quiet and in walking distance to restaurants and transit. Wifi and TV worked well and the kitchen had everything you needed. We highly recommend this host and the property.

We went to Buenos Aires to celebrate our 25th anniversary.  We very much enjoyed staying at the loft. 
Victoria made our check-in and check out very easy and was ready to answer our questions when we contacted her.
The loft is located in a quiet part of Palermo, and it's very close to great bars and restaurants and to the Subte Station.
The loft was exactly as depicted. We never used the kitchen, but it looked very well supplied.
If we come back (which we definitely want to do) we will choose this loft again. 
Just a couple of suggestions:
- Leave a SUBTE card, it was not easy to find one and we had to walk to several kioskos to get one. We left our card for the next guest.
- Add a small cabinet to the bathroom, there's no place to put all our toiletries
- Add a padded mattress cover to the bed, bed is a little too hard.

I stayed in the apartment with my girlfriend for 6 nights and we loved it. The whole setup is really cool, with the nice balcony and the bed up the stairs.
I think its perfect for couples.
Another big plus is the location. Its about a five minute walk to the next subte station and located in walking distance of plenty amazing cafés and restaurants.
Clara and Victoria were really friendly and helpful as well, made sure it was going smoothly with the check-in and gave us a lot of good restaurant advices!
If it comes to the equipment ofmthe apartment, there's hardly anything to complain about, the kitchen is well equipped, the internet and the airmcondition work very well and the whole apartment is clean. The only thing my girlfriend would have appreciated is a hairdryer:)
So first thing i'll do when planning another BA trip is to book this apartment again!

After a long trip through Patagonia on our motorbike we were glad coming back to BA finding that comfort. Victoria arranged to pick up the keys in another area, that was a challenge for us as the traffic is dense. The flat is nice in a good ambient, near to public transportation Subte and to Palermo Center.

Clara was incredibly helpful in getting us set up and coordinating all the details for pickup/dropoff of the keys. The apartment was super clean and provided all the essentials and we absolutely loved the neighborhood.

My boyfriend and I stayed in this loft for a week and really loved it! The area is quiet, pretty, safe, close to transit, grocery stores, and close to so many great restaurants. The loft was exactly as depicted and our host made sure to check in on us to ensure everything was okay. We would definitely stay in this place again. Thanks!
Apartment was simple but perfect for what we needed. Balcony was nice. Good location in Palermo. Had no problems and Victoria (Clara's sister) was very friendly and helpful.

Accoglienza e organizzazione ottima.
CLara è gentile e molto disponibile, ed è intervenuta subito nel momento in cui ho avuto l'esigenza.
Appartamento favoloso, zona centralissima e vicino a laundry, supermercati, mezzi.
Lo consiglio vivamente perhe io no sono rimasta davvero contenta.

We were very happy in the apartment. It is attractive, modern and comfortable. We liked the feel of space created by the mezzanine floor and large windows. It was great to sit out on the balcony for breakfast or an evening drink. The apartment is adequately equipped and you can just about make a light meal in the compact kitchen. Clara made the the booking process, check -in and check-out very easy. The apartment is well located for all services. It is only a short walk to the metro and large supermarket. There is also an inexpensive laundry across the road. There are lots of restaurants and bars close by, but it is a 15 minute walk to the central area of Palermo's bars and restaurants. We will definitely use the apartment again when next in Buenos Aires.

Clara was lovely.  She was available and helpful and flexible in meeting me on both ends of my stay in the apartment.  

The apartment was very comfortable, clean and pretty much had all the basics that you'd need for a short stay.

There were a few rainy days during which I just sat on the couch in the living room, which was perfectly comfortable and quite enjoyable.  The view is nice the apartment is quite bright and cheery.

It's in a quiet part of Palermo, and is not far from the Palermo stop on the D line subway.  You can also find some good food just down Angel Justiniano Carranza.

Passamos uma dúzia de dias maravilhosos no loft duplex de Clara Aguirre. A localização é ótima para quem deseja viver a cidade por uma temporada: nas quadras próximas há supermercados, vendinhas, açougues, padarias, queijarias - e a cozinha do apartamento é bem equipada para quem deseja cozinhar e, de quebra, ainda aproveitar o clima, o vento e a vizinhança tipicamente portenhos na mesinha da sacada. O andar de cima proporciona privacidade e aconchego, com uma cama excelente e um chuveiro bem potente. A televisão tem uma infinidade de canais e ainda há como ver DVDs e ouvir música. Tudo o que é preciso consta do apartamento, de mapas da cidade a revistas de países diversos, de produtos de limpeza a toalhas para reposição. E as fotos retratam muito bem como o loft é gracioso e especial, de saquinhos de chás e uma chaleira elétrica maravilhosa a temperos básicos. 
A recepção da Clara foi ótima: as orientações foram precisas e preciosas.
O bairro é muito bom, afinal, Palermo é ótima com seus 4000 restaurantes e sua arquitetura aconchegante. Há linhas de metrô e ônibus e uma infinidade de taxis por ali, a minutos do loft. E ainda é muito possível fazer tudo a pé. 
Não temos nenhuma reclamação ou queixa. Ao contrário: ficamos bem impressionados com o aconchego do apartamento, com a gentileza da dona do apartamento, com a educação dos vizinhos, com a funcionalidade do prédio, com a tranquilidade da rua, com  o bairro.
Eu já havia vindo mais de 10 vezes a Buenos Aires e era a primeira vez que eu alugava uma moradia.  Essa experiência foi maravilhosa. Eu só pensava que se estivesse num hotel, não teria sacada, não poderia abrir janelas, não teria uma geladeira, não teria vontade de ficar mais de 10 minutos acordada no quarto e ainda teria aqueles inconvenientes que muitos hotéis costumam ter, como o mofo e o carpete. 
Então, alugar o duplex me trouxe uma nova perspectiva e uma lição: passar mais de 3 dias em hotel, nunca mais.
Recomendo o loft para uma pessoa ou um casal que queira viver a cidade, descansar e sentir de verdade que tem um lar temporário nessa cidade maravilhosa.

Apartment – Top!
Location – Top!
Host – Top!
Appliances – Top!
Infortmational help from host – Top!
Building security – Top!
Neighbors – Top!

If you're not satisfied, it's probably because of you and not the apartment...

Clara was very sweat, interested, nice girl. She helped me for my arrangements, gives me some tips about city, leave sube( metro) card. Flat is very safe, clean, comfortable, suitable for couple or solo traveler. Balcony, large glass windows, stylish loft appareance was nice to live.
Recommended !
reviews.response: Than you Selin for your presents :). Very kind of you !!

reviews.comments: Clara's flat was perfect for our stay. Well located, a good size, a great shower and the balcony was a real bonus for when we wanted to eat at the flat. Clara was v helpful and told us where to get the best rate for our dollars. She also gave us a travel card for the buses and subte.  Tips from us; go to Franks (hidden speakeasy) for drinks, La Brigada in San Telmo for great steak, and watch out for the dog poo!

Clara's apartment is absolutely beautiful! I felt very at home as soon as I arrived and the loft is exactly as shown in the pictures. It is in a great location surrounded with many amazing restaurants and cafes within walking distance. Victoria (Clara's sister) greeted me upon my arrival and was very helpful throughout my stay. She was also very flexible with an early and late check in/out time. I even extended my stay by a few days because I loved it so much - I would highly recommend this apartment! Thanks again for everything!
reviews.response:
Thanks Ann!!! Lovely to host you, hope to see you soon. You can always contact us if you need something during your stay in Buenos Aires !
Best!
Victoria

reviews.comments:
Our stay here was perfect! The loft is exactly like what is on the pictures, it's very bright and very homey. And the location is just awesome - supermarkets, dry cleaner and subte super close, and restaurants/bars are aboundant. 
We haven't met Clara, but she was quick and great in responding our questions online. And her sister is very lovely! 
The only hickup is that if you want to prepare a proper meal, you have to be inventive as there are few utensils at hand (it's possible :). Otherwise, we highly recommend this place.

The location of the apartment was great - about a 2km walk to central Palermo. Metro was also close however we walked everywhere. We love to cook a few meals while we are away but found that the kitchen lacked a few of the essential utensils like a chopping board and sharp cutting knife. Clara was great with the communication and more than happy to help out.

Eu e Andrezza, minha namorada, nos hospedamos por 14 dias no loft da Clara. No checkin quem nos recebeu foi sua irmã, Victoria, que nos deixou uma ótima primeira impressão de como seriamos recebidos em Buenos Aires, dando todas as explicações necessárias sobre o apartamento e nos surpreendendo com um email contendo diversas dicas gastronômicas e de entretenimento da região.

O apartamento é lindo (como nas fotos), limpo e muito bem localizado. A cada esquina do bairro existe uma opção da melhor culinária portenha, bem como, de culinária estrangeira.

Apesar da fama de alguns cafés como Tortone, Hotel Alvear e Confeitaria Ideal, bem próximo ao apartamento existem opções de cafés da manha e da tarde, na nossa opinião, tão saborosos e aconchegantes quanto, tais como: Oui oui, Pani e Le Pain Quotidien.

O apartamento tem uma cozinha completa, perfeita pra quem deseja cozinhar em casa. Contribuindo com isso tem também opções de mercados como o Jumbo e o Carrefour Express, há aproximadamente 2 quarteirões.

A estação de metrô fica a alguns quarteirões, de onde é possível chegar aos principais pontos de Buenos Aires em vagões muito limpos (com cheiro de eucalipto), rápido e por apenas 5 pesos.

Conhecemos a Clara no checkout. E nossa unânime definição é que ela é a simpatia em pessoa. Conversamos por um bom tempo sobre assuntos aleatórios e, muito gentilmente, chamou o táxi pra gente na hora programada.

Enfim, recomendamos fortemente que conheçam a Clara e a Victoria, e especialmente, recomendamos a hospedagem neste apartamento.

Great apartment, great location, pleasent hoasts.
Maybe not enough cooking utensils, but nothing else that was negative.
Great experience.
Gracias!

Nous avons passé dix nuits dans l appartement de clara. C'était parfait! L'appartement était parfaitememt propre à notre arrivée et pour nous il y avait tout ce qu'il nous fallait. Tous les soirs on a mangé dans le quartier de palermo - tout autour de la maison. On reviendra :)
